// combine the reducers and export them
import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{loadingBarReducer}from'react-redux-loading';import authedUser from'./authedUser';import questions from'./questions';import users from'./users';import currentTab from'./currentTab';export default combineReducers({users:users,questions:questions,authedUser:authedUser,currentTab:currentTab,loadingBar:loadingBarReducer});
